title: CAR MODEL detail page Â» BRAND
user_story:
As a visitor\
On the CAR MODEL detail page\
I want to see a link to the connected BRAND\
So I can find more CAR MODELS they have created
description:
* The CAR MODEL detail page is extended to contain a section for the connected BRAND.
* The BRAND is presented with its name and primary information.
* The BRAND contains a link to its detail page.
* The BRAND has a thumbnail image.
* When there is no BRAND connected to the CAR MODEL then the section is not displayed at all.
